SuperstitioMod:Sensitive.NAME: Sensitive
DESCRIPTIONS: Each [E] you use immediately gives you #b%d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure. NL Upon #ysuperstitiomod:Orgasm, all card energy costs are temporarily reduced by [E] . NL #ysuperstitiomod:Multiple Orgasms further reduce energy cost.

SuperstitioMod:DevaBody_Lupa.NAME: Corrupted Wrath Deva
DESCRIPTIONS: You no longer lose HP from any source. NL Instead, gain stacks of #rCorruption when you would lose HP. NL Taking damage from attacks causes you to #ysuperstitiomod:Embrace Corruption. NL All #rCorruption is cleared at the end of combat.
SuperstitioMod:DevaBody_Lupa.FLAVOR: Your body is invulnerable to swords and spears—but *guns* are a different story.

SuperstitioMod:StartWithSexToy.NAME: Little Toy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, you equip %d #ysuperstitiomod:Sex Toy(s).

SuperstitioMod:SemenMagician.NAME: Semen Mage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack card, you #ysuperstitiomod:gain Semen.

SuperstitioMod:LewdGirlComing.NAME: Lewd Girl Incoming!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. At the start of battle, a random enemy gains #b%d stack(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Cheat Death.
